enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve adding a child node to the current element, with appendElement specifically creating a new Element node.
Both methods involve creating and adding a new Element node to the current element, with prependElement adding it at the start.
The childElementsList method can be used to verify the newly added element is correctly appended to the list of child elements.
The children method can be used to assert that the newly added element is present in the list of child elements.
